EmailTemplate.description: For Jeremy Kirkland only. Initial email to introduce Platinum Purchasing porgram
EmailTemplate.name: Flex to AJ Email 1 - Jeremy Kirkland
EmailTemplate.subject: Platinum Purchasing is here!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good day, I want to take a minute to let you about a new and exciting program from Office Depot.
Platinum Purchasing is a dynamic office supply program for businesses just like yours. Your business can take advantage of the combined buying power of this multi-million dollar office supply program, which provides aggressive discounts on the supplies you use everyday. And there are no participation fees or contractual spend obligations.
Platinum Purchasing program benefits include: Best value core list with up to 80% off 300 frequently ordered items Custom best value core list available Store Purchasing Card available so you can receive your program pricing in store Copy & Print Services discounts include B&W at .025 cents, Color at .22 cents and 35% off finishing services Aggressive pricing on cleaning and breakroom supplies
I will be contacting you soon to discuss this exciting new program.
Thank you.
Jeremy Kirkland Senior Account Manager Office DEPOT | Business Solutions Division jeremy.kirkland@officedepot.com 855.337.6811 x 2897
Office Depot® is a trademark of The Office Club, Inc. OfficeMax® is a trademark of OMX, Inc. © 2017 Office Depot, Inc. To ensure delivery to your inbox, please add officedepot@e.business.officedepot.com to your safe sender list or address book. Privacy Policy
